comment.author: 43219271@N00
comment._content: I never knew the stars on the flag were arranged that way.

comment.author: 56922921@N08
comment._content: Stars on the flag didn't have a set arrangement for quite some time, consider especially that we kept adding states at a decent pace through the 19th century! A lot of designs became popular ranging from the traditional stars-in-a-row we are familiar with to patterns with the stars in the shape of flowers, a large star, a turtle etc etc...
